title: Circle
description: A streamlined interface to collect patient information with an AI voice agent. It also makes patient records easily accessible through a smart search feature.

title: Aletheia
description: An app that scans medical documents and prescriptions with OpenAI APIs and explains them in simple terms based on the patient's history.

title: Speech Classification
description: A spiking neural network that classifies speech records of English and German digits

title: RMS Norm Transformers
description: A research project that shows LLM transformers with modified RMS Norm layers to make them more efficient

title: 4-Year College Planner
description: This website uses a drag and drop system and web scraping to make a 4 year for college courses at UCSC.

title: Simple Minecraft
description: A simple minecraft game made with webGl
